displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.
displayProperties.name: Marksman's Dodge

displayProperties.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.
displayProperties.name: Gambler's Dodge

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Jump

displayProperties.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.
displayProperties.name: Triple Jump

displayProperties.description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Arcbolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that splits upon impact, creating multiple projectiles that seek enemies.
displayProperties.name: Skip Grenade

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to enemies.
displayProperties.name: Flux Grenade

displayProperties.description: Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.
displayProperties.name: Arc Staff

displayProperties.description: Kill an enemy with this melee ability to trigger health regeneration and increase your melee damage temporarily. Stacks up to 3 times.
displayProperties.name: Combination Blow

displayProperties.description: Melee kills recharge your dodge ability.
displayProperties.name: Combat Flow

displayProperties.description: Dodging increases your melee range, allowing you to lunge further to strike enemies.
displayProperties.name: Deadly Reach

displayProperties.description: After dodging, each Arc Staff hit creates a damaging lightning aftershock.
displayProperties.name: Lethal Current

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to disorient the target and nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Disorienting Blow

displayProperties.description: Sprinting recharges your dodge ability. Increased maximum sprint speed.
displayProperties.name: Focused Breathing

displayProperties.description: While critically wounded, melee and grenades recharge drastically faster.
displayProperties.name: Combat Meditation

displayProperties.description: You are harder to kill while dodging.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Reflexes

displayProperties.description: While wielding your Arc Staff, hold down  to deflect incoming projectiles. Deflecting projectiles triples Arc Staff damage for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Whirlwind Guard

displayProperties.description: After sliding, activate this melee ability to unleash a devastating uppercut attack.
displayProperties.name: Tempest Strike

displayProperties.description: Melee hits greatly increase weapon reload speed.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Weave

displayProperties.description: Hit a target with an Arc ability to electrify them. Meleeing electrified enemies disorients them and grants grenade, melee, and dodge energy.
displayProperties.name: Ebb and Flow
